===Etymology===
{{IPAchar|/pakupatu/}} → {{IPAchar|/bakufat͡su/}} → {{IPAchar|/bakuhat͡su/}}

From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=はくはつ'}} compound {{m|zh|爆發|tr=pɑk pjot|lit=burst, explode + fly or send forth}}.  Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} reading ''bàofā'', {{etyl|yue|-}} ''baau<sup>3</sup> faat<sup>3</sup>''.
